command.text: select "CB_TestExpressions"."TestID" "TestID" ,"Test"."TestName" "TestTestName" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."TestExpressionID" "TestExpressionID" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."ParentTestExpressionID" "ParentTestExpressionID" ,"ParentTestExpression"."JoinCriteria" "ParentTestExpressionJoinCriteria" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElement"."DataElementName" "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElementDataElementName" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent"."Name" "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElementEventName" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightDataElement"."DataElementName" "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElementDataElementName" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightDataElementEvent"."Name" "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElementEventName" ,"ParentTestExpressionOperator"."Code" "ParentTestExpressionOperatorCode" ,"ParentTestExpressionTemplate"."TemplateName" "ParentTestExpressionTemplateTemplateName" ,"ParentTestExpressionTest"."TestName" "ParentTestExpressionTestTestName" ,"ParentTestExpressionAtrributeEvent"."AttributeID" "ParentTestExpressionAtrributeEventAttributeID" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent"."Name" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventName" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftEventEventType"."EventType" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventEventTypeEventType" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftEventLogSource"."Code" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventLogSourceCode" ,"ParentTestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource"."Code" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventTimeSourceCode" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightEvent"."Name" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventName" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightEventEventType"."EventType" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventEventTypeEventType" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightEventLogSource"."Code" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventLogSourceCode" ,"ParentTestExpressionRightEventTimeSource"."Code" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."LeftEventID" "LeftEventID" ,"LeftEvent"."Name" "LeftEventName" ,"LeftEventEventType"."EventType" "LeftEventEventTypeEventType" ,"LeftEventLogSource"."Code" "LeftEventLogSourceCode" ,"LeftEventTimeSource"."Code" "LeftEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."LeftDataElementID" "LeftDataElementID" ,"LeftDataElement"."DataElementName" "LeftDataElementDataElementName" ,"LeftDataElementEvent"."Name" "LeftDataElementEventName" ,"LeftDataElementEventEventType"."EventType" "LeftDataElementEventEventTypeEventType" ,"LeftDataElementEventLogSource"."Code" "LeftDataElementEventLogSourceCode" ,"LeftDataElementEventTimeSource"."Code" "LeftDataElementEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."OperatorID" "OperatorID" ,"Operator"."Code" "OperatorCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."RightEventID" "RightEventID" ,"RightEvent"."Name" "RightEventName" ,"RightEventEventType"."EventType" "RightEventEventTypeEventType" ,"RightEventLogSource"."Code" "RightEventLogSourceCode" ,"RightEventTimeSource"."Code" "RightEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."RightDataElementID" "RightDataElementID" ,"RightDataElement"."DataElementName" "RightDataElementDataElementName" ,"RightDataElementEvent"."Name" "RightDataElementEventName" ,"RightDataElementEventEventType"."EventType" "RightDataElementEventEventTypeEventType" ,"RightDataElementEventLogSource"."Code" "RightDataElementEventLogSourceCode" ,"RightDataElementEventTimeSource"."Code" "RightDataElementEventTimeSourceCode" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."StartDateRange" "StartDateRange" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."EndDateRange" "EndDateRange" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."OrderSeq" "OrderSeq" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."AtrributeEventID" "AtrributeEventID" ,"AtrributeEvent"."AttributeID" "AtrributeEventAttributeID" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."Weight" "Weight" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."Threshold" "Threshold" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."TemplateID" "TemplateID" ,"Template"."TemplateName" "TemplateTemplateName" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."JoinCriteria" "JoinCriteria" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."DateCreated" "DateCreated" ,"CB_TestExpressions"."DateModified" "DateModified" from "dbo"."CB_TestExpressions" "CB_TestExpressions" left join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "Test" on "CB_TestExpressions"."TestID" = "Test"."TestID" left join "dbo"."CB_TestExpressions" "ParentTestExpression" on "CB_TestExpressions"."ParentTestExpressionID" = "ParentTestExpression"."TestExpressionID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElement" on "ParentTestExpression"."LeftDataElementID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent" on "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElement"."EventID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElement" on "ParentTestExpression"."RightDataElementID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElementEvent" on "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElement"."EventID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."CB_ExpressionOperator" "ParentTestExpressionOperator" on "ParentTestExpression"."OperatorID" = "ParentTestExpressionOperator"."OperatorID" left join "dbo"."CB_QueryTemplate" "ParentTestExpressionTemplate" on "ParentTestExpression"."TemplateID" = "ParentTestExpressionTemplate"."TemplateID" left join "dbo"."CB_Tests" "ParentTestExpressionTest" on "ParentTestExpression"."TestID" = "ParentTestExpressionTest"."TestID" left join "dbo"."Dim_EventAttribute" "ParentTestExpressionAtrributeEvent" on "ParentTestExpression"."AtrributeEventID" = "ParentTestExpressionAtrributeEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent" on "ParentTestExpression"."LeftEventID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventEventType" on "ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent"."EventTypeID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventLogSource" on "ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent"."LogSourceID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource" on "ParentTestExpressionLeftEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "ParentTestExpressionLeftEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "ParentTestExpressionRightEvent" on "ParentTestExpression"."RightEventID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventEventType" on "ParentTestExpressionRightEvent"."EventTypeID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventLogSource" on "ParentTestExpressionRightEvent"."LogSourceID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "ParentTestExpressionRightEventTimeSource" on "ParentTestExpressionRightEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "ParentTestExpressionRightEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "LeftEvent" on "CB_TestExpressions"."LeftEventID" = "LeftEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "LeftEventEventType" on "LeftEvent"."EventTypeID" = "LeftEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "LeftEventLogSource" on "LeftEvent"."LogSourceID" = "LeftEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "LeftEventTimeSource" on "LeftEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "LeftEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "LeftDataElement" on "CB_TestExpressions"."LeftDataElementID" = "LeftDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "LeftDataElementEvent" on "LeftDataElement"."EventID" = "LeftDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "LeftDataElementEventEventType" on "LeftDataElementEvent"."EventTypeID" = "LeftDataElementEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "LeftDataElementEventLogSource" on "LeftDataElementEvent"."LogSourceID" = "LeftDataElementEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "LeftDataElementEventTimeSource" on "LeftDataElementEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "LeftDataElementEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."CB_ExpressionOperator" "Operator" on "CB_TestExpressions"."OperatorID" = "Operator"."OperatorID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "RightEvent" on "CB_TestExpressions"."RightEventID" = "RightEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "RightEventEventType" on "RightEvent"."EventTypeID" = "RightEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "RightEventLogSource" on "RightEvent"."LogSourceID" = "RightEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "RightEventTimeSource" on "RightEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "RightEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."CB_DataElement" "RightDataElement" on "CB_TestExpressions"."RightDataElementID" = "RightDataElement"."DataElementID" left join "dbo"."DIM_Events" "RightDataElementEvent" on "RightDataElement"."EventID" = "RightDataElementEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."LU_EventTypes" "RightDataElementEventEventType" on "RightDataElementEvent"."EventTypeID" = "RightDataElementEventEventType"."EventTypeID" left join "dbo"."LU_LogSource" "RightDataElementEventLogSource" on "RightDataElementEvent"."LogSourceID" = "RightDataElementEventLogSource"."LogSourceID" left join "dbo"."LU_TimeSource" "RightDataElementEventTimeSource" on "RightDataElementEvent"."TimeSourceID" = "RightDataElementEventTimeSource"."TimeSourceID" left join "dbo"."Dim_EventAttribute" "AtrributeEvent" on "CB_TestExpressions"."AtrributeEventID" = "AtrributeEvent"."EventID" left join "dbo"."CB_QueryTemplate" "Template" on "CB_TestExpressions"."TemplateID" = "Template"."TemplateID"
